message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.PL, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a framework for constructing OpenAI Gym environments from PDDL domains and problems, which is particularly well-suited for research in relational reinforcement learning and relational sequential decision-making. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning), which are both focused on developing intelligent agents and learning algorithms. The paper also discusses design decisions and implementation details, which suggests a focus on programming languages and compilers, making cs.PL (Programming Languages) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the framework can be used for building diverse benchmarks, which could be relevant to robotics (cs.RO) and systems and control (cs.SY).
